channel.title: How do u proxy on rs?
channel.description: :confused: ive been looking for the past few daays.. i want to know how to proxy on rs using mozila firefox.. my friend told me to get a 5socks proxy off of the net and i got one but it doesnt work.. i duno what im doing wrong can anyone please help.. like a step by step guide or just a small paragraph please help :confused:

item.title: How do u proxy on rs?
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

you heard it helps. But it doesnt. They’ll still have your UID logged.
And by the way, i dont know if anything has changed recently, but JageX can’t IP ban. There are probably too many people playing off of public computers to do this. So therefor using a proxy while playing rs won’t do anything but give you un-wanted lag

Read full topic
item.source: How do u proxy on rs?

edit… i checkedl ike 100+ proxies for socks 5 lol… none worked

Read full topic
item.source: How do u proxy on rs?

item.title: How do u proxy on rs?
item.dc:creator: @saltnpepper saltnpepper
item.description:
@saltnpepper wrote:

yeh ur unlucky…
for dialuppers like me using unsigned generate titanic lag…
so the way you do it is by opening two rs windows…
log into one…
then quickly go to c:\ windows\ .file_store_32
then delete the uid.dat (this is the temporary userid file rs creates)
then log into the other account.
i haven’t been banned ofr it yet
i don’t know whether this method is banfree tho. it’s alot less laggier though.
oh and here’s a guide i found
Proxying on Runescape
By: Bobert5696
use socks5,

Step 1: Go to http://www.atomintersoft.com/product...y/socks5-list/
Step 2: Copy all of the proxies listed in the page in this format: proxy:ort
Step 3: Go to http://www.checker.freeproxy.ru/checker/
In the big text box, paste the list in, and under proxy type select socks5.
Click submit, it wil test the proxies, when you have found a working one, go to where you would normally type in proxies,
but put the proxy where it says socks hosts, or proxy (depends on web browser) Then put the port where it says port.
Note: only put the proxy and port under the socks category, nothing else.

I was just wondering does proxying help you not get your accounts banned when you auto on rs? (i mean like they can’t link you’re autoer account to your main,etc)

Read full topic

item.source: How do u proxy on rs?

item.title: How do u proxy on rs?
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

PaulT:

Just use an usigned applet in one.

What he said Just be warned that they do apparantly look for people using this method to trade between characters and stuff.

In case you’re interested, using a proxy here wouldn’t make a difference as jagex checks whether you’ve logged in by using a user id, which is specific to a computer - the unsigned applet has no persmissions to read the stored uid and therefore generates its own.

Read full topic
